headline.main: Volkswagen to Unveil Self-Driving Car as Part of Post-Dieselgate Shift
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen to Unveil Self-Driving Car as Part of Post-Dieselgate Shift

lead_paragraph: Volkswagen will show off a fully self-driving car at the Geneva auto show, as part of the German carmaker's drive to be at the forefront of new technologies in the wake of its diesel emissions scandal.
snippet: Volkswagen will show off a fully self-driving car at the Geneva auto show, as part of the German carmaker's drive to be at the forefront of new technologies in the wake of its diesel emissions scandal....
